text: Ba qavmi [munqarizsudai] Od cunon sarvatu qudrate doda ʙudem, ki ʙa sumo [makkagijon hargiz] nadodaem va ʙo on ki ʙa onon niz casmu gus va dil doda ʙudem, ammo gusu casm va dilhojason sude ʙa holason nadost, zero ojoti ilohiro inkor mekardand va [sarancom] azoʙe, ki masxaraas mekardand, domangirason sud
